query.statement: SELECT '' AS CHECK ,CS127_GNO AS GNO ,CS136_JYM AS JYM ,COALESCE(CS131_YYM,'') AS YYM ,CS136_PST AS PST ,CTEXT2 AS PST_NM ,DOUBLE(CS131_TOT) AS TOT ,CS136_GYM AS GYM ,CS136_BAM AS BAM ,CS136_IY1 AS IY1 ,CS136_IY2 AS IY2 ,CS136_IY3 AS IY3 ,CS136_IY4 AS IY4 ,CS136_RET AS RET ,CS136_BAM+CS136_IY1+CS136_IY2+CS136_IY3+CS136_IY4+CS136_RET AS JAR ,CS131_TIS AS TIS ,CS136_RMK AS RMK ,CASE WHEN TRIM(CS131_YDT) > '' THEN SUBSTR(CS131_YDT,7,2) ELSE '' END AS YDT ,CS131_SEQ AS SEQ1 ,CS131_GND AS GND1 ,CS131_ISR AS ISR1 ,CS136_SEQ AS SEQ2 ,CS136_GND AS GND2 ,CS136_ISR AS ISR2 ,A.CS127_UPN AS UPN ,A.CS127_CST AS CST ,A.CS127_UPN AS PJT ,'Z99' AS HNO ,DOUBLE(CS131_AMT) AS AMT ,DOUBLE(CS131_VAT) AS VAT ,'' AS FLAG1 ,'' AS FLAG2 ,0 AS PER ,CS136_HAM AS HAM ,CS136_DAM AS DAM ,CS136_ACAM AS ACAM ,CS131_HMT AS HMT ,CS131_DMT AS DMT ,CS131_ACMT AS ACMT ,'N' HYN ,'N' DYN ,'N' ACYN FROM SAPHEE.ZCST127 AS A ,SAPHEE.ZCST136 AS B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 AS C ON C.MANDT = B.MANDT AND C.CS131_UPN = B.CS136_UPN AND C.CS131_CST = B.CS136_CST AND C.CS131_PJT = B.CS136_PJT AND C.CS131_HNO = B.CS136_HNO AND C.CS131_SEQ = B.CS136_SEQ AND C.CS131_ISR = B.CS136_ISR AND C.CS131_MYM = B.CS136_JYM AND C.CS131_MYB = '' ,SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS D WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS127_UPN = #UPN# AND A.CS127_CST = #CST# AND A.CS127_SEQ = #SEQ# AND A.CS127_ISR = #ISR# AND A.CS127_GNO = #GNO# AND B.CS136_JYM BETWEEN #USD# AND #UHJ# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS127_UPN = B.CS136_UPN AND A.CS127_CST = B.CS136_CST AND A.CS127_SEQ = B.CS136_SEQ AND A.CS127_ISR = B.CS136_ISR AND A.CS127_GNO = B.CS136_GNO AND B.CS136_GND = 'E' AND B.MANDT = D.MANDT AND B.CS136_PST = D.CODE2 AND D.CODE1 = 'CS117' AND D.LANG = #G_LANG# AND (B.CS136_MGB = '' OR (B.CS136_MGB = 'Y' AND B.CS136_MSA = '09')) AND ((B.CS136_GBU = '3' AND B.CS136_GGB = '') OR ((B.CS136_GBU = '1' AND B.CS136_GGB = '9' AND B.CS136_MSA = '09') OR (B.CS136_GBU = '3' AND B.CS136_GGB = '9' AND B.CS136_MSA = '09' AND B.CS136_BDGBN = 'X') ) ) WITH UR
